import React from 'react'; import { AppBar, Flex, IconButton, Box, Frame, Typography, css, Avatar, Dialog, Backdrop, Snackbar, Spacer, Spinner, Menu, useComponentState, } from './components/UI'; import useApp from './hooks/useApp'; import { Smiley, Close, Hamburger, Search } from './icons'; import './style.css'; export default function App() { const {state, setState} = useComponentState({open: false}); const { open } = state; return (
Rachet-UI Docs Ratchet-SQL [[ {open.toString()}]] setState('open', !open)} align="center" className="search-box" mr={16}> Search... Ctrl+K Search Box
); }
